name: Icefall
description:
Wonky downhill ice skating inspired by web-games of days past.

If you only see a gray screen that is because your browser is blocking cookies/site data 

Controls:

Quit to Main MenuQ Retry LevelRMove Left LegA/DMove Right LegLeft Arrow/Right ArrowBend Left KneeWBend Right KneeUp Arrow

Tips:

  • To stand, hold D and Left Arrow
  • To knee slide, hold W and Up Arrow while standing
  • To jump, let go of W and Up Arrow while knee sliding
  • Jump off a ledge for extra pop
  • Raise your legs off a ledge to take height off
  • Jump on a downward slope for extra forward speed

frazao.dev
